intent: Iteratively refine an essay through writer-critic feedback loop

success_criteria.primary: Final essay is noticeably better than first draft
success_criteria.secondary: Critique points from earlier iterations are addressed

quality_rubric.relevance: Addresses remote work trends meaningful to business leaders
quality_rubric.insight: Goes beyond obvious points (flexibility good, isolation bad)
quality_rubric.structure: Clear logical flow appropriate for busy executives
quality_rubric.polish: Final version reads professionally, no rough edges

convergence.success_indicator: Critic finds no major issues OR max iterations
